actions.name: AddCustomRoutingEndpoints
actions.description: Grants permission to add a virtual private cloud (VPC) subnet endpoint to a custom routing accelerator endpoint group

actions.name: AddEndpoints
actions.description: Grants permission to add an endpoint to a standard accelerator endpoint group

actions.name: AdvertiseByoipCidr
actions.description: Grants permission to advertises an IPv4 address range that is provisioned for use with your accelerator through bring your own IP addresses (BYOIP)

actions.name: AllowCustomRoutingTraffic
actions.description: Grants permission to allows custom routing of user traffic to a private destination IP:PORT in a specific VPC subnet

actions.name: CreateAccelerator
actions.description: Grants permission to create a standard accelerator

actions.name: CreateCrossAccountAttachment
actions.description: Grants permission to create a CrossAccountAttachment

actions.name: CreateCustomRoutingAccelerator
actions.description: Grants permission to create a Custom Routing accelerator

actions.name: CreateCustomRoutingEndpointGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to create an endpoint group for the specified listener for a custom routing accelerator

actions.name: CreateCustomRoutingListener
actions.description: Grants permission to create a listener to process inbound connections from clients to a custom routing accelerator

actions.name: CreateEndpointGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to add an endpoint group to a standard accelerator listener

actions.name: CreateListener
actions.description: Grants permission to add a listener to a standard accelerator

actions.name: DeleteAccelerator
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a standard accelerator

actions.name: DeleteCrossAccountAttachment
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a CrossAccountAttachment

actions.name: DeleteCustomRoutingAccelerator
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a custom routing accelerator

actions.name: DeleteCustomRoutingEndpointGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an endpoint group from a listener for a custom routing accelerator

actions.name: DeleteCustomRoutingListener
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a listener for a custom routing accelerator

actions.name: DeleteEndpointGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an endpoint group associated with a standard accelerator listener

actions.name: DeleteListener
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a listener from a standard accelerator

actions.name: DenyCustomRoutingTraffic
actions.description: Grants permission to disallows custom routing of user traffic to a private destination IP:PORT in a specific VPC subnet

actions.name: DeprovisionByoipCidr
actions.description: Grants permission to releases the specified address range that you provisioned for use with your accelerator through bring your own IP addresses (BYOIP)

actions.name: DescribeAccelerator
actions.description: Grants permissions to describe a standard accelerator

actions.name: DescribeAcceleratorAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a standard accelerator attributes

actions.name: DescribeCrossAccountAttachment
actions.description: Grants permissions to describe a CrossAccountAttachment

actions.name: DescribeCustomRoutingAccelerator
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a custom routing accelerator

actions.name: DescribeCustomRoutingAcceleratorAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the attributes of a custom routing accelerator

actions.name: DescribeCustomRoutingEndpointGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to describe an endpoint group for a custom routing accelerator

actions.name: DescribeCustomRoutingListener
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a listener for a custom routing accelerator

actions.name: DescribeEndpointGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a standard accelerator endpoint group

actions.name: DescribeListener
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a standard accelerator listener

actions.name: ListAccelerators
actions.description: Grants permission to list all standard accelerators

actions.name: ListByoipCidrs
actions.description: Grants permission to list the BYOIP cidrs

actions.name: ListCrossAccountAttachments
actions.description: Grants permission to list all CrossAccountAttachments

actions.name: ListCrossAccountResourceAccounts
actions.description: Grants permission to list accounts with CrossAccountAttachments listing caller as a principal

actions.name: ListCrossAccountResources
actions.description: Grants permission to list all CrossAccountAttachment resources usable by caller

actions.name: ListCustomRoutingAccelerators
actions.description: Grants permission to list the custom routing accelerators for an AWS account

actions.name: ListCustomRoutingEndpointGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to list the endpoint groups that are associated with a listener for a custom routing accelerator

actions.name: ListCustomRoutingListeners
actions.description: Grants permission to list the listeners for a custom routing accelerator

actions.name: ListCustomRoutingPortMappings
actions.description: Grants permission to list the port mappings for a custom routing accelerator

actions.name: ListCustomRoutingPortMappingsByDestination
actions.description: Grants permission to list the port mappings for a specific endpoint IP address (a destination address) in a subnet

actions.name: ListEndpointGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to list all endpoint groups associated with a standard accelerator listener

actions.name: ListListeners
actions.description: Grants permission to list all listeners associated with a standard accelerator

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list tags for a globalaccelerator resource

actions.name: ProvisionByoipCidr
actions.description: Grants permission to provisions an address range for use with your accelerator through bring your own IP addresses (BYOIP)

actions.name: RemoveCustomRoutingEndpoints
actions.description: Grants permission to remove virtual private cloud (VPC) subnet endpoints from a custom routing accelerator endpoint group

actions.name: RemoveEndpoints
actions.description: Grants permission to remove an endpoint from a standard accelerator endpoint group

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add tags to a globalaccelerator resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a globalaccelerator resource

actions.name: UpdateAccelerator
actions.description: Grants permission to update a standard accelerator

actions.name: UpdateAcceleratorAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to update a standard accelerator attributes

actions.name: UpdateCrossAccountAttachment
actions.description: Grants permission to update a CrossAccountAttachment

actions.name: UpdateCustomRoutingAccelerator
actions.description: Grants permission to update a custom routing accelerator

actions.name: UpdateCustomRoutingAcceleratorAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to update the attributes for a custom routing accelerator

actions.name: UpdateCustomRoutingListener
actions.description: Grants permission to update a listener for a custom routing accelerator

actions.name: UpdateEndpointGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to update an endpoint group on a standard accelerator listener

actions.name: UpdateListener
actions.description: Grants permission to update a listener on a standard accelerator

actions.name: WithdrawByoipCidr
actions.description: Grants permission to stops advertising a BYOIP IPv4 address
